statements: SELECT * FROM parking_regulations WHERE permit_required = TRUE;
SELECT street_name, regulation_type FROM parking_regulations;
SELECT id, street_name, regulation_type FROM parking_regulations WHERE permit_required = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM parking_regulations WHERE street_name = 'Main Street';
SELECT id, street_name, regulation_type, permit_required FROM parking_regulations ORDER BY street_name DESC;
SELECT street_name, regulation_type FROM parking_regulations WHERE permit_required = TRUE
SELECT * FROM parking_regulations WHERE id = 1
SELECT street_name FROM parking_regulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Residential'
SELECT id, street_name, regulation_type FROM parking_regulations ORDER BY street_name ASC
SELECT * FROM parking_regulations WHERE permit_required = FALSE
SELECT * FROM Parking_Regulations;
SELECT id, fine_amount, regulation FROM Parking_Regulations ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT permit_id, vehicle_number, start_date, end_date FROM Parking_Permits WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Parking_Permits WHERE permit_id = 1001;
SELECT permit_id, vehicle_number FROM Parking_Permits ORDER BY permit_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Parking_Regulations WHERE fine_amount > 50 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC
SELECT regulation, fine_amount FROM Parking_Regulations WHERE fine_amount BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY regulation ASC
SELECT * FROM Parking_Permits WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT permit_id, vehicle_number, start_date FROM Parking_Permits WHERE vehicle_number LIKE 'AB%' ORDER BY permit_id
SELECT permit_id, vehicle_number, end_date FROM Parking_Permits WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM CityOfficials;
SELECT official_id, name FROM CityOfficials ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ParkingRegulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name FROM ParkingRegulations WHERE regulation_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, validity_period FROM ParkingPermits WHERE validity_period > 30;
SELECT * FROM CityOfficials WHERE official_id = 1
SELECT name, email FROM CityOfficials ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM ParkingPermits WHERE permit_type = 'Resident' AND validity_period > 30
SELECT CO.name, PR.regulation_name FROM CityOfficials CO JOIN ParkingRegulations PR ON CO.official_id = PR.regulation_id
SELECT * FROM ParkingPermits WHERE permit_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM parking_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM parking_regulations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM parking_locations ORDER BY location_capacity DESC;
SELECT permit_type, permit_duration, permit_cost FROM parking_permits WHERE permit_cost > 50;
SELECT violation_type, violation_datetime FROM parking_violations WHERE violation_datetime > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY violation_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM parking_regulations WHERE regulation_id > 5;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM parking_regulations WHERE regulation_name = 'Parking Permit Regulations';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM parking_locations WHERE location_capacity > 50 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT permit_type, permit_cost FROM parking_permits WHERE permit_duration >= 30 AND permit_cost < 50.00;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_datetime FROM parking_violations ORDER BY violation_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Parking_Regulations;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_type FROM Parking_Regulations WHERE regulation_start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_address, city FROM Parking_Locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT official_name, official_role, department FROM City_Officials WHERE city = 'Seattle';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM Permit_Applications WHERE application_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Parking_Regulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Parking Permit';
SELECT regulation_description FROM Parking_Regulations WHERE regulation_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_address, city FROM Parking_Locations WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM Permit_Applications WHERE application_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT official_name, official_role, department FROM City_Officials WHERE city = 'New York';
